1. Forget the Santa Claus Rally -- Artificial Intelligence Stocks Like Broadcom, Amazon, and Rivian Dragged the Stock Market Down Today  The Motley Fool
  2. US Stocks Fall to Close Out Best Two-Year Stretch Since 1998  Bloomberg
  3. Stock market today: Wall Street indexes lose ground as market closes another record-breaking year  The Associated Press
  4. S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Slips as Stocks Close Out Strong Year  Investopedia
  5. Wall Street ends lower, capping a banner year  Reuters
